com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.drive

Class TankDrive.TankLocalizer

  • com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.drive.TankDrive.TankLocalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Localizer
    Enclosing class:
    TankDrive

    public static class TankDrive.TankLocalizer
implements Localizer

    Default localizer for tank drives based on the drive encoders and (optionally) a heading sensor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TankLocalizer

        @JvmOverloads
public TankLocalizer(@NotNull
                                   TankDrive drive,
                                   boolean useExternalHeading)

        Default localizer for tank drives based on the drive encoders and (optionally) a heading sensor.

        Parameters:
        drive - drive
        useExternalHeading - use external heading provided by an external sensor (e.g., IMU, gyroscope)
